channel.title: Mercenary Shield Bug?
channel.description:
In this game, there were 2 Mercs. #9 and #10 On n2, Merc #9 and Merc #10 both shield the prince (#5). The next day, #10 claims "I shielded the prince, and he was attacked 2x! My shield saved him" I respond with "Thats a lie, I shielded him too, but my shield didnt trigger." We hang #10 and he really WAS a merc.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? My shield should have triggered too, or at least first. I was #9, so with all things being equal should be 1 step earlier in the trigger rotation.
#### Steps to reproduce: Have 2 mercs shield someone who is attacked on the same night.
